Song.title: Your Mercy And Kindness
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Mark Altrogge © 2001 Sovereign Grace Praise

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [G D | Em7 C | G D | Em7 C | G D | Em7 C | G | D]
Verse 1: [Em]O Lord, You are my shepherd, [C2]in You I have no needs [D2]You make me rest in green fields, [C2]and walk by quiet streams [Em]O Lord You are my shepherd, [C2]Your love restores my soul [D2]And for Your name and glory, [C2]You show me the way to [Dsus | Dsus]go
Chorus: [G]Your [D]mercy [Em7] and [C]kindness [G]Pur[D]sue me[Em7] for[C]ever [G]My [D]cup runs [Em7]over [C]with Your [G | D]grace [G]Your [D]mercy [Em7] and [C]kindness [G]Pur[D]sue me[Em7] for[C]ever [G]And [D]I’ll be [Em7]with You [C]all my [G | A | C2 | C2]days
Verse 2: [Em]O Lord, You are my shepherd [C2]Though I walk through death’s dark shade [D2]Your rod and staff give comfort, [C2]I will not be afraid [Em]O Lord, You are my shepherd, [C2]a table You have spread [D2]In sight of all my foes, Lord, [C2]and You anoint my [Dsus | Dsus]head
